name: Trash Wars
description:
The hero appears in the city after the post-Apocalypse. Adventures await him. Its main task is to free the city from garbage. But during the build process, he is prevented by aliens (mobs) that push him away from the garbage, but he can kill them by jumping on their heads. Play the game and defeat the trash!

Control: WASD - Move; E - Interract; Space - Jump.
